Verses: 1 karththaave, En Vinnappaththai Kelum; En Kooppidudhal Ummidaththil Servadhaaga.
2 en Aabaththunaalile Umadhu Mugaththai Enakku Maraiyaadheyum; Umadhu Seviyai Ennidaththil Saayum; Naan Kooppidugira Naalile Enakku Theeviramaai Uththaravu Arulichcheyyum.
3 en Naatkal Pugaiyaippol Ozhindhadhu; En Elumbugal Oru Kolliyaippol Eriyundadhu.
4 en Irudhayam Pullaippol Vettundu Ularndhadhu; En Pojanaththai Pusikka Marandhen.
5 en Perumoochchin Saththaththinaal, En Elumbugal En Maamsaththodu Ottikkollugiradhu.
6 vanaandhara Naaraikku Oppaanen; Paazhaana Idangalil Thangum Aandhaiyaippolaanen.
7 naan Niththiraiyillaamal Veettinmel Thaniththirukkum Kuruviyaippol Irukkiren.
8 naadorum En Saththurukkal Ennai Nindhikkiraargal; Enmel Moorkkaverikondavargal Enakku Virodhamaai Saabam Idugiraargal.
9 neer Ennai Uyara Thookki, Thaazhaththallineer, Umadhu Sinaththirkum Kadunkobaththirkum Ullaanen.
10 aadhalaal Naan Saambalai Appamaaga Pusiththu, En Baanangalai Kanneerode Kalakkiren.
11 en Naatkal Saaindhupogira Nizhalaippolirukkiradhu; Pullaippol Ularndhupogiren.
12 karththaraagiya Neero Endrendraikkum Irukkireer; Ummudaiya Per Pirasthaabam Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Nirkum.
13 ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Adhin Kallugalmel Vaanjaivaiththu, Adhin Mannukku Paridhabikkiraargal.
14 ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Adhin Kallugalmel Vaanjaivaiththu, Adhin Mannukku Paridhabikkiraargal.
15 karththar Seeyonai Katti, Thamadhu Magimaiyil Velippaduvaar.
16 thikkatravargaludaiya Jebaththai Alatchiyampannaamal, Avargal Vinnappaththai Angeegarippaar.
17 appozhudhu Jaadhigal Karththarudaiya Naamaththukkum, Boomiyilulla Raajaakkalellaarum Ummudaiya Magimaikkum Bayappaduvaargal.
18 pinsandhadhikkaaga Idhu Ezhudhappadum; Sirushtikkappadum Janam Karththarai Thudhikkum.
19 karththar Kattundavargalin Perumoochchai Ketkavum, Kolaikku Niyamikkappattavargalai Vidudhalaiyaakkavum,
20 thammudaiya Uyarndha Parisuththa Sthalaththilirundhu Paarththu, Vaanangalilirundhu Boomiyinmel Kannokkamaanaar.
21 karththarukku Aaraadhanaiseyya, Janangalum Raajyangalum Egamaai Koodikkollugaiyil,
22 seeyonil Karththarudaiya Naamaththaiyum, Erusalemil Avarudaiya Thudhiyaiyum Pirasthaabappaduththuvaargal.
23 vazhiyile En Belanai Avar Odukki, En Naatkalai Kurugappanninaar.
24 appozhudhu Naan: En Dhevane, Paadhi Vayadhil Ennai Eduththukkollaadheyum; Ummudaiya Varushangal Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Irukkum.
25 neer Aadhiyile Boomiyai Asthibaarappaduththineer; Vaanangal Ummudaiya Karaththin Kiriyaiyaayirukkiradhu.
26 avaigal Azhindhupom, Neero Nilaiththiruppeer; Avaigalellaam Vasthirampol Pazhamaiyaaippom; Avaigalai Oru Saalvaiyaippol Maatruveer, Appozhudhu Maarippom.
27 neero Maaraadhavaraayirukkireer; Umadhu Aandugal Mudindhupovadhillai.
28 umadhu Adiyaarin Pillaigal Thaabariththiruppaargal; Avargal Sandhadhi Umakku Munbaaga Nilaipetrirukkum Endru Sonnen.
